Name: Standard Bearer
Text Box: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

Name: Ponder
Text Box:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.

Name: Pestilence
Text Box:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Text Box: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
